kulami.game

Interface GameObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameDisplay, StatusDisplay

    public interface GameObserver
    Classes that want to be notified of game state changes have to implement this interface.
    Author:
    gordon

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void boardChanged(GameObservable game)
      The board has changed.
      void flagsChanged(GameObservable game)
      The display flags have changed.
      void gameChanged(GameObservable game)
      A marble has been placed.

    • Method Detail

      • gameChanged

        void gameChanged(GameObservable game)
        A marble has been placed. Use GameObservable.getMarbles() to get the marbles.
        Parameters:
        game -

      • boardChanged

        void boardChanged(GameObservable game)
        The board has changed. Use GameObservable.getBoard() to get the board.
        Parameters:
        game -

      • flagsChanged

        void flagsChanged(GameObservable game)
        The display flags have changed. Use GameObservable.getDisplayFlags() to get the DisplayFlags object.
        Parameters:
        game -
